name: Missile Escape (OuterSpaceGames Studios)
description:
Blast your way through a massive high score trying your hardest to stay alive. Endless rounds of enemies, but how long can you last?

Endless levels

Time attack game mode

Endless game mode

Use "W,A,S,D" to move 

Hold "Left" on mouse to aim and shoot

Art made by; /www.patreon.com/SparklinLabs?ty=h

Music by;  /www.abstractionmusic.com
